summary: A drama reveals the great writer's inauspicious early years as an orphan raised by conniving relatives.
cast: Aleksei Lyarsky|Varvara Massalitinova|Mikhail Troyanovskiy|Elizaveta Alekseeva|Vyacheslav Novikov|Aleksandr Zhukov|K. Zubkov|Daniil Sagal|Sergey Tikhonravov|Igor Smirnov|E. Mamaev|V. Korochentchikov|Valentin Korneyev|A. Lebedev|Vladimir Maslatsov|Nikolay Pogodin|B. Radkevich
title: Detstvo Gorkogo
